domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

text:
Poverty, inequality, climate change, attacks on human rights... Did you really think the world before #COVID19 was normal?

Now we can do better.

With education. With science. With culture. With information.

Together, let's build #TheNextNormal.
